definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The critical speed of one turbopump rotor on elastic support was computed by FEMQZ.
sentences.chinese: 计算分析了某涡轮泵转子在弹性支承下的临界转速。

sentences.english: Electric machines are composed of stator and rotor.
sentences.chinese: 电机是由定子和转子两部分构成的。

sentences.english: The prestress method should be developed in the study of the rotor dynamics problems.
sentences.chinese: 预应力法在转子动力学问题的研究中可进一步拓展。

sentences.english: The Transfer Matrix Method (TMM) and the Finite Element Method (FEM) are two ordinary calculating methods for rotary system.
sentences.chinese: 传递矩阵法和有限元法是转子动力学分析的常用方法。

sentences.english: Depending on the characteristics of products used and on the type of stators and rotors.
sentences.chinese: 根据产品使用特点及定子和转子的类型确定流量。

sentences.english: In China, some aero-engines start to use single crystal turbine blades in practice.
sentences.chinese: 在国内，某些发动机上亦开始使用单晶涡轮转子叶片。

sentences.english: The explicit expressions of free surface and resultant forces imposing on the rotor are obtained.
sentences.chinese: 求得了自由面和作用在转子上的合力的显式表达式。

sentences.english: This paper presents an improved scheme of rotor position estimation for PMSM.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种永磁同步电动机转子位置估算的改进方法。

sentences.english: Unbalance is one of the most frequent faults occurs in turbomachinery.
sentences.chinese: 其中以不平衡为转子系统中最常发生之故障。

sentences.english: Rotor is an important assembly of hammer mill.
sentences.chinese: 转子是锤片式粉碎机的主要工作部件。

sentences.english: When rub-impact occurs, there is a rub-impact force on rotor and box.
sentences.chinese: 当碰摩发生时，转子与机匣都受到碰摩力的作用。

sentences.english: A new type of arc cycloidal internal meshing rotary pump was studied.
sentences.chinese: 对一种新型圆弧摆线内啮合转子泵进行了研究。

sentences.english: Cold-rolled steel impeller metal external rotor motors welding.
sentences.chinese: 冷轧钢板叶轮金属外转子电机弧焊。

sentences.english: The dispit beater contains the rotor parts of sieve-mesh of normal beater.
sentences.chinese: 打浆机包含普通打浆机筛网转子部件。

sentences.english: The Atkinson cycle can be used in a rotary engine.
sentences.chinese: 阿特金森循环的，可以用在转子发动机。

sentences.english: Rotary blade has applied latest V-shaped cutting technique.
sentences.chinese: 转子刀具采用最新的V形切割技术。

definition: cylinder (of steam engine or internal combustion engine)
